title: The Virgin and the Playboy
description:
This is a 
1NS
 tale. Each story in this much loved, multi-authored series, centres around the Madame Eve's 1Night Stand (1NS) Dating/Matchmaking Services, headquartered at the Castillo Resort. Each matchmaking novella offers a guaranteed HEA, and the stories come in all types, with all natures of relationships. There's something for each reader in this series with over 200 books so far!!Julie, accidental virgin, has waited longer than she ever planned to lose her virginity and join everyone else she knows in dating reality. Embarrassed at her plight, she has made arrangements with 1NightStand to meet with a handsome stranger for one night of no commitment required sexuality, without having to admit she'd never made love before.Mark is the one single guy left in his group of friends. As such, he is known for the bevy of lovelies he dates, and his stories of wild exploits between the sheets. His participation in 1NightStand is on a dare, and he has no idea that his date is ... less experienced than he is used to. And so much more ...When they enter the penthouse suite in Las Vegas, they enter a chamber designed for luxury and booked for a 1NightStand.
author: Kate Richards
